title-group.article-title: Methods for Simulating Steady-State and Dynamic Behaviour of Two-Way Cartridge Circuits

permissions.copyright-statement: Copyright 1991 Society of Automotive Engineers, Inc.

abstract.p: The simulation of both the steady-state and dynamic behaviour is a common major problem in computer aided analysis programs for two-way cartridge valve circuits. The simulated system is also mathematically very inflexible and nonlinear. By employing the simulation and modelling techniques introduced in this paper, a reasonable computation time and quite good accuracy can be achieved.
